channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache -- Apache Commons Beanutils
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache -- Apache Commons Beanutils

item.title: CVE-2019-10086|2024-08-04T22:10:09.585Z -- apache -- apache%20commons%20beanutils
item.description: In Apache Commons Beanutils 1.9.2, a special BeanIntrospector class was added which allows suppressing the ability for an attacker to access the classloader via the class property available on all Java objects. We, however were not using this by default characteristic of the PropertyUtilsBean.
